shows.Title: Severance
shows.Overview: From Ben Stiller, this series stars Adam Scott as a man whose memories have been surgically divided by his employer.

shows.Title: Prime Target
shows.Overview: A brilliant math student (Leo Woodall) is on the verge of a major breakthrough when a shadowy enemy tries to stop him. Fighting for answers—and his life—he teams up with a government agent to unravel a high-stakes conspiracy.

shows.Title: Silo
shows.Overview: In an underground society, Juliette (Rebecca Ferguson) investigates a co-worker’s death and uncovers shocking secrets.

shows.Title: Ted Lasso
shows.Overview: Winner of 13 Emmy® Awards, including back-to-back Outstanding Comedy Series wins (2021, 2022). Jason Sudeikis is a football coach leading a British soccer team. What he lacks in knowledge, he makes up for with optimism...and biscuits.

shows.Title: Surface
shows.Overview: A traumatic head injury leaves Sophie with extreme memory loss. In her quest to put the pieces of her life back together—with help from her husband and friends—Sophie begins to question the truth behind her picture-perfect life.

shows.Title: Shrinking
shows.Overview: Jimmy is struggling to grieve the loss of his wife while being a dad, friend, and therapist. He decides to try a new approach with everyone in his path: unfiltered, brutal honesty. Will it make things better—or unleash uproarious chaos?

shows.Title: Slow Horses
shows.Overview: This quick-witted spy drama follows a dysfunctional team of MI5 agents—and their obnoxious boss, the notorious Jackson Lamb (Gary Oldman)—as they navigate the espionage world’s smoke and mirrors to defend England from sinister forces.

shows.Title: Mythic Quest
shows.Overview: Meet the team behind the biggest multiplayer video game of all time. But in a workplace focused on building worlds, molding heroes, and creating legends, the most hard-fought battles don’t occur in the game—they happen in the office.

shows.Title: Foundation
shows.Overview: Based on the award-winning novels by Isaac Asimov, Foundation chronicles a band of exiles on their monumental journey to save humanity and rebuild civilization amid the fall of the Galactic Empire.

shows.Title: For All Mankind
shows.Overview: Imagine a world where the global space race never ended. This thrilling “what if” take on history from Ronald D. Moore (Outlander, Battlestar Galactica) spotlights the high-stakes lives of NASA astronauts and their families.

shows.Title: The Morning Show
shows.Overview: This Emmy® winner is an unapologetically candid drama that looks at the modern workplace through the lens of the people who help wake America up. Pull back the curtain on early morning TV.

shows.Title: See
shows.Overview: In the far future, humankind has lost its sense of sight. Jason Momoa stars as the father of twins born with the mythic ability to see—who must protect his tribe against a threatened queen. Dave Bautista and Alfre Woodard also star.

shows.Title: Invasion
shows.Overview: Earth is visited by an alien species that threatens humanity’s existence. Events unfold in real time through the eyes of five ordinary people across the globe as they struggle to make sense of the chaos unraveling around them.

shows.Title: Monarch: Legacy of Monsters
shows.Overview: After surviving Godzilla’s attack on San Francisco, Cate is shaken yet again by a shocking secret. Amid monstrous threats, she embarks on a globetrotting adventure to learn the truth about her family—and the mysterious organization known as Monarch.

shows.Title: Masters of the Air
shows.Overview: From Steven Spielberg, Tom Hanks, and Gary Goetzman—the producers of Band of Brothers and The Pacific. During World War II, airmen risk their lives with the 100th Bomb Group, a brotherhood forged by courage, loss, and triumph.

shows.Title: Dark Matter
shows.Overview: In this mind-bending thriller, Jason Dessen is abducted into an alternate version of his own life. To get back to his real family, Dessen embarks on a journey to save them from the biggest foe imaginable: himself. Based on Blake Crouch’s bestseller.

shows.Title: Where's Wanda?
shows.Overview: After the Klatts’ daughter goes missing, they take matters into their own hands and hatch a wild plan: Spy on the neighborhood. As they make their way into small-time espionage, shocking secrets come to light one by one.

shows.Title: Bad Sisters
shows.Overview: Sharon Horgan stars in this dark comedy about sisters being investigated for the death of their toxic brother-in-law.
